04

Interviewer So where is your company exactly?

Zuckerman It's in Palo Alto, in California.

Interviewer You are a CEO, so are you at work all the time?

Zuckerman Yes, I am. But my work colleagues are also my friends. For example, Dustin Moskovitz, Head of Engineering, is a friend from college. And Adam D'Angelo is my Chief Technology Officer. We're old friends from school.
